dialogue.text: I hear with my little ear...
My instincts! Sharp as ever! I welcome thee!
It's been long. Long? Long! Far too long for the presence of another human!
Hee hee! Tell me! Tell me everything of you, I beg!
I'm Hanbaisha! But for simplicity sake and for your lovely invitation to build a friendship, call me T!
"I never said anything about friendship?" Nonsense! Any bleeding spectacle who enters my rich(?) shop is a companion in my rules!
Ah! A shop! You can't leave just yet! I have dingsdabums you can buy!
"I don't have any money"? Pshhhhh, I never said anything about money...
I mean uh... You can pay with your attention span! Yes! That's a currency in my humble abode! Yep! Since forever! Hah!
Turn your head to the right! See those minigames on my shelf? They're yours to be played with! Exciting I knoooow!
Just click, press, hold, touch, whatever! Just don't leave! Why would you? It's so interesting in here!
